channel.title: How do i make it so my friends can join my server?
channel.description:
Hey I need help on so my friends can join my server. Help would be very appreciated! I've been on youtube all day trying to find guides but i follow everything and it just doesn't seen to work :/ I have teamviewer, skype and msn
Skype: Peter-grayson Msn: Pete_ere_2k8@hotmail.com

item.title: How do i make it so my friends can join my server?
item.dc:creator: @Petergrayson Petergrayson
item.description:
@Petergrayson wrote:

I’ve portforward my router, but when i go to test it it says port is closed. Someone said this is something to do with windows firewall? But i’ve researched it and can’t find nothing useful.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make it so my friends can join my server?

item.title: How do i make it so my friends can join my server?
item.dc:creator: @pokemonn pokemonn
item.description:
@pokemonn wrote:

you need to portforward, run no-ip, change client ip to your no-ip, send client to your friends, they login. this is the most BASIC thing when it comes to rsps and you did something wrong then because following a youtube video is not hard

Read full topic
